targets.query: SELECT last("Value") FROM "socket_listener_CLUSTERPERF" WHERE ("MetricId" = 'Volume.IOPS.Read,Volume=S2D-N1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Value") FROM "socket_listener_CLUSTERPERF" WHERE ("MetricId" = 'Volume.IOPS.Read,Volume=S2D-N2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Value") FROM "socket_listener_CLUSTERPERF" WHERE ("MetricId" = 'Volume.IOPS.Write,Volume=S2D-N1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Value") FROM "socket_listener_CLUSTERPERF" WHERE ("MetricId" = 'Volume.IOPS.Write,Volume=S2D-N1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Write_Bytes_persec") FROM "CSV_FS" WHERE ("host" = 'S2D-N1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Write_Bytes_persec") FROM "CSV_FS" WHERE ("host" = 'S2D-N2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Read_Bytes_persec") FROM "CSV_FS" WHERE ("host" = 'S2D-N1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Read_Bytes_persec") FROM "CSV_FS" WHERE ("host" = 'S2D-N1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT last("Reads_persec_Total"), last("Writes_persec_Total") FROM "Total_persec_Total" GROUP BY "host" ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT last("StorageEfficiency"), last("HealthNum"), 100- last("PercentFree") FROM "socket_listener_PS" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "FriendlyName"
SELECT last("PercentComplete") FROM "HC"."socket_listener_JOBS" WHERE $timeFilter AND  "PercentComplete" < 100 GROUP BY "name"
